name: On A Roll To Mars
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

ITEMS:

Potions can heal you from 1-2 times!

Random Blocks can heal or hurt you!

Checkpoints save your place when you die

STORY:

You have lost your home while traveling around the galaxy and now you have finally flew back to Mars. Now find your way back while avoiding deathly missiles, rovers and meteorites!
